titleStmt.title: A letter to Dr. du Moulin, containing a charitable reproof for his schismatical book entituled, A short and true account of the several advances the Church of England hath made towards Rome, &c. to which are added Some seasonable words to Mr. Richard Baxter.
titleStmt.author: Philotheus.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
